recipes.title: Spaghetti Bolognese
recipes.instructions: Cook spaghetti. Sauté onions and garlic, brown the beef, add tomatoes, simmer 20 mins, combine.

recipes.title: Chicken Curry
recipes.instructions: Cook onions and garlic, add curry powder and chicken, pour in coconut milk, simmer 25 mins.

recipes.title: Pancakes
recipes.instructions: Mix ingredients into batter. Cook in buttered pan until golden on both sides.

recipes.title: Caesar Salad
recipes.instructions: Toss lettuce with dressing, add croutons, parmesan, and grilled chicken.

recipes.title: Grilled Cheese Sandwich
recipes.instructions: Butter bread, insert cheese, grill until crispy and golden.

recipes.title: Tomato Soup
recipes.instructions: Cook all, blend, and simmer with basil.

recipes.title: Beef Tacos
recipes.instructions: Cook beef with spices, assemble with toppings in shells.

recipes.title: Vegetable Stir Fry
recipes.instructions: Stir-fry vegetables with garlic, ginger, and soy sauce.

recipes.title: Fried Rice
recipes.instructions: Cook rice, scramble eggs, stir-fry all together with soy sauce.

recipes.title: Chocolate Cake
recipes.instructions: Mix ingredients, bake at 180°C for 30-35 mins.

recipes.title: Avocado Toast
recipes.instructions: Mash avocado, season, spread on toasted bread.

recipes.title: Mac and Cheese
recipes.instructions: Cook pasta, make cheese sauce with roux, combine.

recipes.title: Greek Salad
recipes.instructions: Chop ingredients, toss with olive oil.

recipes.title: Omelette
recipes.instructions: Beat eggs with milk and seasonings, cook in pan with veggies.

recipes.title: BBQ Chicken Wings
recipes.instructions: Marinate wings in BBQ sauce, bake or grill until cooked.

recipes.title: Sushi Rolls
recipes.instructions: Lay rice on nori, add fillings, roll and slice.

recipes.title: Lemonade
recipes.instructions: Juice lemons, mix with sugar and water, add mint.

recipes.title: French Toast
recipes.instructions: Dip bread in egg mixture, cook on pan until golden.

recipes.title: Garlic Bread
recipes.instructions: Mix garlic with butter, spread on bread, bake until golden.

recipes.title: Banana Smoothie
recipes.instructions: Blend all until smooth and creamy.
